alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:41PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Otero, Crowley and east central Pueblo Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 341 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking developing strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Forder to near Boone. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fowler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
